description: BigJig allows you to choose from jigsaw puzzles packaged with the program and download more from its website. In addition, you can choose the size of the pieces and their shape styles to increase the difficulty.

When you save your puzzle progress in version 5 of BigJig, the program creates an SV5 file to store the puzzle progress. To create an SV5 file with version 5 of BigJig, click the Menu puzzle piece icon, then select File â†’ Save Game or Save As... .
